articles.author: Nicole Clark
articles.title: Elden Ring’s SNES fan demake is packed with nostalgia
articles.description: A new project from the popular demake YouTuber 64 Bits imagines Elden Ring for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES). Beloved characters, like the Pope Turtle, appear in pixel art form. Praise the dog!

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Smile, the upcoming horror movie, has a genuinely frightening new trailer
articles.description: Smile is a new horror movie from Paramount Pictures and writer-director Parker Finn. Its new trailer full of fixed grins is legitimately unnerving. Smile will arrive in theaters on Sept. 30.
articles.content: Smile, and the world smiles with you

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Sega and Creative Assembly announce Hyenas, a zero-G FPS with a twist
articles.description: Hyenas is a new multiplayer sci-fi FPS from Alien: Isolation developer Creative Assembly and Sega. Players take on the role of scavengers who steal from Mars’ billionaires.
articles.content: Players will battle for pop culture merch in, uh, The Taint

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Gran Turismo 7’s new free update includes the Ford Model Roadster
articles.description: Gran Turismo 7’s new free update, called Patch 1.17, includes three new cars and the Watkins Glen International race track, along with three new gameplay menus.

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 board game brings the sci-fi action RPG to tabletop
articles.description: Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City is the latest in CMON’s string of Kickstarter-backed board games. Set in the dystopian metropolis of Night City, players must choose between four gangs to vie for resources and conquer the criminal underworld.
articles.content: Experience Night City from a whole new point of view

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Pokémon Go adding more Ultra Beasts at Go Fest events
articles.description: Pokémon Ultra Beasts Pheromosa, Buzzwole, and Xurkitree are coming to Pokémon Go, debuting at Go Fest events in Seattle, Berlin, and Sapporo this summer.
articles.content: Go Fest ticket buyers will get them first

articles.title: Valve updates Team Fortress 2 after “Save TF2” fan campaign
articles.description: Valve, almost a month after responding to a fan campaign, have released a new update for Team Fortress 2 intended to address several exploits and glitches that have plagued the game in recent years.

articles.title: Nintendo Direct: How to watch the Xenoblade Chronicles 3 Direct stream
articles.description: Nintendo’s newest Nintendo Direct presentation is all about Xenoblade Chronicles 3 for Switch. A new stream promises 20 minutes of new info about the upcoming Switch RPG.
articles.content: Nintendo promises 20 minutes of info on the Switch RPG
